analysis.description:
MCPSale.doPayouts (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#426-438) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- addresses[i].transfer(payouts[i]) (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#433-434)

MCPSale (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#72-569) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#506-514)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#530-538)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#539-548)

MCPSale.completeRegionAuction (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#305-314) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- region_bids[regionId].currentBuyer == address(0)
	- region_bids[regionId].activeTill > now || region_bids[regionId].activeTill == 0

MCPSale.completeRegionAuction (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#305-314) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- region_bids[regionId].currentBuyer == address(0)
	- region_bids[regionId].activeTill > now || region_bids[regionId].activeTill == 0
MCPSale.takeRegion (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#316-324) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(region_bids[regionId].currentBuyer == msg.sender)

MCPSale.doPayouts has external calls inside a loop:
	- addresses[i].transfer(payouts[i]) (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#433-434)

MCPSale.defaultRegionTax should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#124-125)
MCPSale.divider should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#122-124)
Parameter '_beneficiary' of Beneficiary.setBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#54) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_mapMaster' of MCPSale.setMapMaster (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#201) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of MCPSale.setMinMargin (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#205) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of MCPSale.setBasePrice (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#206) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_regionId' of MCPSale.addRegion (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#243) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_startPrice' of MCPSale.addRegion (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#243-244) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_regionName' of MCPSale.addRegion (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#244) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_regionId' of MCPSale.regionExists (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#262) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of MCPSale.approve (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#507) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenId' of MCPSale.approve (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#507-508) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of MCPSale.transfer (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#530) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenId' of MCPSale.transfer (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#530) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of MCPSale.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#539-541) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of MCPSale.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#542) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenId' of MCPSale.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0x2c2391f793f4f81475d87fffe366458ce5380a13.sol#542) is not in mixedCase
